meanings.definition: A type of smoking device typically used to smoke cannabis.
meanings.sent1: I saw a colorful bong at the party.
meanings.sent2: She filled the bong with water before lighting up.
meanings.sent3: The bong sat on the shelf, waiting for its turn to shine.
meanings.sent4: The bong whispered secrets of relaxation to those who used it.
meanings.sent5: The bong bubbled happily as it was passed around the circle.

meanings.definition: To make a deep resonant sound, like a bell.
meanings.sent1: The church bells bonged loudly on Sunday morning.
meanings.sent2: The old grandfather clock bonged every hour.
meanings.sent3: The bonging sound echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent4: His heart bonged with excitement as he approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The drums bonged rhythmically in the distance.

meanings.definition: A sudden loud noise, like a gunshot.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected bong startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: The bong of the gong signaled the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The bong of the doorbell broke the silence of the night.
meanings.sent4: The bong of the hammer hitting the metal echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The bong of the fireworks filled the night sky with color.
